author: gsim
msg: QPID-3603: Act on bridge cancellations before creations
This ensures that recreation of a bridge does not result in two active subscriptions (evench can cause confusion for replicators, even if they are both active only for a very short period).

author: scottbw
msg: Added an onerror tag to the img tag in the Widget Browse widget so that missing images aren't displayed in the item detail
